apiservice.name: Aesir E-Commerce - Product Field Webservice
apiservice.author: Aesir
apiservice.description: Maintain and translate product custom fields.

create.description: This operation creates a new Aesir E-Commerce product custom field

field.name: id
field.description: Product custom field ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: name
field.description: Field name

field.name: title
field.description: Field title

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: field_group_id
field.description: Field group to which the field belong

field.name: type_code
field.description: Data type of this field

field.name: filter_type_code
field.description: Data type of this field when used as a filter

field.name: values_field_id
field.description:
Referenced field storing the values used for this field.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: description
field.description: Field description

field.name: multiple_values
field.description: Defines if the field can store multiple values for a single product

field.name: only_available
field.description: Defines filter will render all options value or just from filtered data

field.name: default_value
field.description: Default value to be stored in the product for this field

field.name: ordering
field.description: Ordering position of this field. If set to 0, it will be sent to the last position.

field.name: searchable_frontend
field.description: Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the frontend (shop)

field.name: searchable_backend
field.description: Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the backend (product administration views)

field.name: global
field.description: Defines if the field belongs to the global scope

field.name: params
field.description: Extra parameters (JSON formatted)

resource.description: New internal product custom field ID upon success, zero on error

list.description: This operation lists all Aesir E-Commerce product custom fields

field.name: id
field.description: Internal Field ID

field.name: type_code
field.description: Data type of this field

field.name: filter_type_code
field.description: Data type of this field when used as a filter

field.name: values_field_id
field.description: Referenced field storing the values used for this field (internal id)

field.name: name
field.description: Field name

field.name: title
field.description: Field title

field.name: description
field.description: Field description

field.name: multiple_values
field.description: Defines if the field can store multiple values for a single product

field.name: field_group_id
field.description: Defines if the field belongs to a specified field group

field.name: searchable_frontend
field.description: Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the frontend (shop)

field.name: searchable_backend
field.description: Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the backend (product administration views)

field.name: global
field.description: Defines if the field belongs to the global scope

field.name: state
field.description: True if published, false if unpublished

fields.description:
Field list fields.

Additional filters:
filter[previous_id] will filter fields above some internal id

resource.description: Defines if the field belongs to a specific field group
Data type of this field when used as a filter
Referenced field storing the values used for this field (internal id)
Defines if the field can store multiple values for a single product
Defines filter will render all options value or just from filtered data
Default value to be stored in the product for this field
Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the frontend (shop)
Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the backend (product administration views)
Defines if the field belongs to the global scope
True if published, false if unpublished
Start displaying from a certain item in the list
Total number of pages of items
Limit the number of listed items
Sort list by field and direction

item.description: This operation displays a single Aesir E-Commerce product custom field

field.name: id
field.description:
Product custom field ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Defines if the field belongs to a specific field group
Data type of this field when used as a filter
Referenced field storing the values used for this field (internal id)
Defines if the field can store multiple values for a single product
Defines filter will render all options value or just from filtered data
Default value to be stored in the product for this field
Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the frontend (shop)
Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the backend (product administration views)
Defines if the field belongs to the global scope
True if published, false if unpublished

update.description: This operation updates a Aesir E-Commerce product custom field

field.name: id
field.description:
Product custom field ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: erp_id
field.description: Set or update the Product custom field ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: name
field.description: Field name

field.name: title
field.description: Field title

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: field_group_id
field.description: Field group to which the field belong

field.name: type_code
field.description: Data type of this field

field.name: filter_type_code
field.description: Data type of this field when used as a filter

field.name: values_field_id
field.description:
Referenced field storing the values used for this field.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: description
field.description: Field description

field.name: multiple_values
field.description: Defines if the field can store multiple values for a single product

field.name: only_available
field.description: Defines filter will render all options value or just from filtered data

field.name: default_value
field.description: Default value to be stored in the product for this field

field.name: ordering
field.description: Ordering position of this field. If set to 0, it will be sent to the last position.

field.name: searchable_frontend
field.description: Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the frontend (shop)

field.name: searchable_backend
field.description: Defines if the field can be used to search for products in the backend (product administration views)

field.name: global
field.description: Defines if the field belongs to the global scope

field.name: params
field.description: Extra parameters (JSON formatted)

fields.description: Product custom field update fields. Send the ID as a reference, and every other field will only be modified if sent, otherwise it will be ignored.

resource.description: Product custom field internal ID upon success, zero on error

delete.description: This operation deletes Aesir E-Commerce product custom field(s).

field.name: id
field.description:
Product custom field ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: True upon success, false on error

publish.description: This task enables you to set specific product fields as published. Expected data: id of the product field

field.name: id
field.description:
Product custom field ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal Product custom field ID upon success, zero on error

unpublish.description: This task enables you to set specific product custom fields as unpublished. Expected data: id of the product custom field

field.name: id
field.description:
Product custom field ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal Product custom field ID upon success, zero on error

translate.description: Adds or update a translation for a product custom field using a language code

field.name: id
field.description:
Product custom field ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: language
field.description: Language code

field.name: name
field.description: Translated product custom field name

field.name: title
field.description: Translated product custom field title

field.name: alias
field.description: Translated alias.

field.name: description
field.description: Translated product custom field description

resource.description: Internal Product custom field ID upon success, zero on error

translateRemove.description: Removes a translation from a product custom field

field.name: id
field.description:
Product custom field ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: language
field.description: Language code

fields.description: Product custom field translate remove fields

resource.description: Internal product custom field ID upon success, zero on error

resources.description: Product custom field translate remove resources
